Body:
"""
    Test that the column names are correctly mapped
    to the index values of the series
    """
ndarr = np.array([[1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 1], [6, 5, 4, 3, 8, 1, 2], [1, 1, 9, 1,
    1, 1, 3], [9, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 4], [3, 3, 3, 9, 3, 3, 5], [1, 2, 2, 9, 1,
    4, 6]])
df = pd.DataFrame(ndarr)
df.columns = ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f', 'g']
ind_cols = ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f']
series = Kruskals.Kruskals.from_pandas_df(df, ind_cols, 'g'
    ).driver_score_to_series()
assert (series.index.values == ind_cols).all()
